name: Gigabyte GM-M6580 Wired Laser Mouse
Features: [High-precision Laser sensor: Enjoy accurate and smooth tracking on virtually any surface., 800/ 1600 DPI adjustable: Point and click the switcher to change 1600 or 800dpi quickly., Back & Forward Buttons: Quicken surf the internet and document through back & forward buttons, Ambidextrous: Total comfort with either hand, Stylish shape with finger grooves: Stylish shape with soft rubber grips and finger grooves give you a superior grasp., Dimension:, 4.61" x 2.36" x 1.84"]
